code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../style.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UploadArea(_ref){let{onFileUpload}=_ref;const[dragging,setDragging]=useState(false);const handleDragOver=event=>{event.preventDefault();setDragging(true);};const handleDragLeave=()=>{setDragging(false);};const handleDrop=event=>{event.preventDefault();setDragging(false);const files=Array.from(event.dataTransfer.files);onFileUpload(files);};const handleBrowseFiles=event=>{const files=Array.from(event.target.files);onFileUpload(files);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"upload-area ".concat(dragging?'dragging':''),onDragOver:handleDragOver,onDragLeave:handleDragLeave,onDrop:handleDrop,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Drag and Drop your files here"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>document.getElementById('fileInput').click(),children:"Browse Files"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",id:"fileInput",multiple:true,hidden:true,onChange:handleBrowseFiles})]});}export default UploadArea;
